metadata.title: CVE-2024-45490 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. xmlparse.c does notreject a negative length for XML_ParseBuffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45490` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.9+esm1
libexpat1 - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.9+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libxmltok1 - 1.2-4ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: expat package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-3ubuntu0.9+esm1').
xmlrpc-c package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vnc4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
gdcm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
smart package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
libxmltok package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2-4ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm3').
